scenario_description: social scenario with a bartender and two customers

occ_emotion: Flirt1, Flirt2, Flirting, None, "Mark flirts with Sarah, telling her she looks stunning tonight."

dialogue_tree: <Start, Greeting, Introduction, None, "Mark and Sarah enter the bar and take a seat.">
<Greeting, Ordering, Introduction, None, "Mark greets Sarah and asks her what she would like to drink.">
<Ordering, Drinking, Purchase, None, "Sarah thanks Mark and begins sipping her wine.">
<Ordering, Drinking, Purchase, None, "Mark begins drinking his beer.">
<Drinking, TVShow1, Interest, None, "Mark asks Sarah if she has seen any good TV shows lately.">
<TVShow1, TVShow2, Interest, None, "Sarah mentions that she has been binge-watching a show on streaming service.">
<TVShow2, Drinking, Interest, None, "Mark says he has heard of that show and the two agree to continue the conversation later.">
<Drinking, Politics1, Controversy, None, "Sarah brings up a political issue and asks Mark his thoughts.">
<Politics1, Politics2, Controversy, None, "Mark disagrees with Sarah's perspective and they begin to debate the issue.">
<Politics2, Drinking, Controversy, None, "Sarah and Mark both calm down and agree to disagree after a while.">
<Drinking, Accident1, Incident, None, "Sarah spills wine on her dress and becomes upset.">
<Accident1, Accident2, Incident, None, "Mark notices and offers to help Sarah clean the stain.">
<Accident2, Drinking, Incident, None, "Sarah accepts Mark's offer and the two continue to drink.">
<Start, Recommend1, None, None, "The bartender approaches Mark and Sarah and asks if they want to try a new drink.">
<Recommend1, Recommend2, None, None, "The bartender describes the drink and the ingredients.">
<Recommend2, Drinking, Purchase, None, "Mark and Sarah both decide to try the drink.">
<Drinking, Travel1, Interest, None, "Sarah asks Mark where he would like to travel.">
<Travel1, Travel2, Interest, None, "Mark mentions his dream destination and asks Sarah the same question.">
<Travel2, Drinking, Interest, None, "Sarah tells Mark about her favorite trip and the discussion continues.">
